uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drink, Pizza, Side

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item
    Abstract class used to contain methods for shared information between Pizza, Drink and Side products. Implements Item interface. Extended by Pizza, Drink & Side
